name: Vergo
text: Once Per Turn: If your (Donquixote Pirates) type Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may return 1 DON!! card from your field to your DON!! deck instead. When Attacking DON!!-1: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -2000 power during this turn.
